name: Colors (shadow_123413)
description:
for best platform download the game pls

/////

if you stuck in level you can simply click Esc and click Restart you will restart the game

it's a simple puzzle game that I made for game jam EIGF , some level easy but some hard the Story about two children kidnapped thir father  by creatures form another dimension

the gameplayExplain you should solve the puzzle uses the brothers(player1 and player2) with out one of these two players you can't solve any puzzle from the game

so you can play it if there any bug can pls tell me that fastest you can

I know some of the levels are hard, so I will put gameplay in the files

have fun while playing it as i did in making it
